div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1684 Delta, 1856 (359) Burial: mid 3rd cent. B.C.? (Jenkins) Contents: AR. Pot hoard Alexander III: tetradr. Philip III: tetradr. Ptolemy I: 2 tetradr. (Alexander hd./Zeus, as Svoronos 22, 24) Ptolemy I: 5 tetradr. (Alexander hd./ Athena, as Svoronos 142, 144, 168) Ptolemy I: 7+ tetradr. (Soter type) Arsinoe II: tetradr. (?) Disposition: Huber (cf. Sotheby, June 4, 1862, 942-8, 995); Reichardt, Schlede- haus parts Huber, NC 1862, p. 163; WNM 1867, pp. 7-8, 20 Waddington, RN 1865, p. 18 = MÃ©langes (Paris, 1867), p. 50
